name: spotifySiriControls
shortDescription: Control Spotify using Siri! You can search for tracks, artists, and albums using commands like, “Search for Drake on Spotify”, or "Search Hello on Spotify". You can also play specific songs with commands like “Play Books by Swiss Lips on Spotify”, “Play You Need to Calm Down on Spotify”, or "Play Taylor Swift on Spotify". Finally, you can also add the currently playing song to a specific playlist with commands like, "Add this to Starred on Spotify" or "Add this song to my workout playlist on Spotify". Requires Assistant+ to be purchased and installed.
author: Zaid Elkurdi

users.issues: Assistant+ requires Spotify re-authentication as soon as you close Assistant+/Spotify. Needs fixing.
When asking Siri to search something on Spotify it only opens spotify
